myself suddenly Church 'less that's the
best way to describe it despite being
deeply betrayed by a pastor whom I
fought loyally supported and encouraged
me I knew something much greater much
more meaningful and important awaited I
imagine a worm curled up in a chrysalis
the opaque glass I shell surrounds the
worm in darkness deep unbroken total
darkness then after a period of
transformation the chrysalis breaks
apart pinpricks of light fight their way
to the trance semi-transparent gloss and
as the shell crumbles beautiful wings
snap out and from the secluded darkness
of a warm home comes the dazzling beauty
of a butterfly with the facade of that
so-called Holiness Church evaporated
under the mighty light of Yahweh my
entire life transformed leading me
beyond church and right back to the
ancient paths only about a month after
being tossed out of that holiness church
I found myself on a crisp cool februari
day preaching to a crowd of a hundred or
so students at Portland State University
a few weeks ago I had been delivered
from a 40-hour week telemarketing job
and landed a position at The Oregonian
working in the matrix of cubicles that
warm the Oregonian's basement and found
that this new inside sales job not only
paid me almost three times the amount
because my previous job but now I only
had to work for about twenty five seven
hours a week
the afternoon of my first day on the job
I called my wife it's only two-thirty
p.m. and i'm already done with work this
is such a blessing Daniel my wife agreed
my hand trembled with excitement as I
helped the receiver close to my lips and
honey the best part is the location do
you realize I'm only a half block away
from Portland State University I can
preach there every day if I want I'm
going down there this afternoon I'll
meet you there my wife said excitedly
and so my ministry at Portland State
University was born I remember that
first day very well my wife pushed the
blue and white stroller with our
sleeping newborn nestled inside though
the trees on the park blocks for bear
and leafless the bright blue sky warm
Sun quickly transformed the winter's day
into an almost spring feeling when I
initially arrived one female student
lingered near the freedom of speech Eric
stage as I began lifting up my voice to

Daniel what about all the many
contradictions in logan in the Levitical
law now being raised as a good Christian
nondenominational boy my knowledge of
the Levitical law was very limited but
as the girl began to try and point out
contradictions the Holy Spirit showed me
again and again how foolish or arguments
work at the same time I began to realize
as the spirit helped me to contend that
the Levitical law was perfect beautiful
and supremely reasonable in all its
facets
a crowd of a hundred soon swelled with
200 and the Spirit gave me one response
after another showing me how to defend

it odd how incredibly sober the crowd
was conviction was falling in waves as I
had never seen before something truly
new and different birth that early
afternoon on campus after preaching for
a number of hours at all linky student
with long dark hair approached me his
narrow face packed with a black go team
could not hide his wide grin as he
thrusts out his hand shake mine I really

wondering if you'd like to visit a
messianic jewish congregation I attempt
my jaw dropped let's shook his hand well
actually that sounds wonderful I just
got thrown out of a church and even
looking for someplace new most bumps
coupled my arms for I knew this was no
chance Messiah was leading exactly
great we meet on Saturday afternoons and
saturday evenings here are the
directions handed me a piece of paper

wife who looked at me dubiously Jewish
Church well we aren't messianic we
believe in Jesus the student assured us
but we also explore the Hebrew roots and
faith I recalled from years ago just as
a little child my mom would pull out
Messianic Jewish records in fact I
vividly remember a faded blue star of
david etched on the cover of one album
then there were the many nights when I
family crowded around our television and

Saturday evening I stepped into a

wedging the baby stroller between us I
looked over an all-out the dancers I had
been that many different types of
churches but never had I seen a line of

heartbreakingly beautiful the minor
chords of Hebrew music filled the

the horn peeled across the sanctuary you
could feel the weight of the Spirit move

the pastor was blowing a shofar after
the intense time of worship and a brief

large basement where oh dang is served
this was actually a fancy Jewish word to
describe a lavish meal to either
celebrate or in this case conclude the
Sabbath day
there seemed to be such a love such joy
such deep peace asad Jewish set up but I
knew beyond a shadow of a doubt we have
found our new church home a few days
later a traveling messianic teacher was
hosting a special midweek conference at
the very same congregation I told Annika
we had to go and invited Deanna along
with her 28 year old son Phillip to join
us after another time of intense praise
in worship I could see the glow
reflected in Vienna and Philips faces
they knew the spirit which I would soon

long thick beard wearing these
funny-looking blue tassels took the

showed that the poor and profits are
still just as relevant today as they

Joshua and all
Martha's man destroyed everything I'd

pure joy bird
here my entire theological upbringing
was crumbling to pieces all around me
yet I felt such a thrill at stepping
Adamek matrix and truly having my eyes
open but nothing else mattered this is
what I had been seeking this was the new
wine that I had been begging for a few
months ago
and ironically this new wine was nothing

that first night and the lights

right in the Bible I'm just blown away I
just don't know about this honey it's
also so different than what we were

different but it's true I mean he kept
using one scripture after another and
mostly from the New Testament my wife
couldn't argue with that
when we arrived home that night my
spirit burns at me I know exactly what I

wife had never been as much in two
Christmases mean so she didn't protest
ironically the revival that its flipped
our house and pretty much relegated

better understood why armload after
armload I heaved every last bit of

decline to return they just couldn't

after he finished I waited in line

over the next several months as I preach

outnumbers 1536 seven and i would not my

actually helped me to learn the Torah

about nine months later my wife had our
second baby elijah thomas lee weighing
in at just over six pounds with a red

truth dawned on me as i held that little

used a midwife for the bird hospitals

because the eighth day from the lightest

shabbat sin Sonic and I were not

me
for the procedure as the eighth they
approach the deep Shalom filled my heart
I knew somehow subway yah was going to
make a way for us to keep his Torah and
have elijah circumcised I tried calling
a local naturopath was also medically

as I got home from work that friday

yet when the phone rang that evening I
hurt the jovial voice of a naturopath on
the other line so I hear you want a
circumcised or newborn yes we are messy
annex you want to do what the Bible says
what a thing to do he said in a
light-hearted tone can you help us the

path community have been against

would do what we were asking I will see

and joyful excitement oh thank you thank
you thank you very much the next morning
on Shabbat we arrived at a small office

laid Elijah on the table the naturopath
pulled me aside I need to let you know
something i often do circumcisions for

of the jewish couples left this week he
said is equal
my eyes white a deep blue zippered cloth

traced through a beautiful stitching

it is an original aunt made to leak from
Jerusalem he said the soft glossy

power hand-stitched images of Jerusalem
covered the tallit I would like you to
have it I think he will get more out of
